Interface_name: Http client-side based on Java.io & HttpURLConnection
Instruction:
Task Description: Create a utility class in Java that handles HTTP requests using HttpURLConnection, with support for custom headers and timeouts.

Class Description: HttpHelper is a final utility class that provides static methods for making HTTP requests. It encapsulates the complexity of HttpURLConnection and provides error handling. The class cannot be instantiated.

Attributes: None (This is a utility class with only static methods)

Methods:
Method1: getHttpContents(String method, String endpoint, Map<String, String> headers) -> String - Makes an HTTP request to the specified endpoint using the given method and headers. Returns the response content as a String.
  - Parameters:
    - method: String - The HTTP method to use (e.g., "GET", "POST")
    - endpoint: String - The URL to send the request to
    - headers: Map<String, String> - Optional map of request headers (can be null)
  - Returns: String - The response content from the server
  - Throws: MongoClientException if an IOException occurs during the request
